about_the_game:
Immerse yourself deeply in the vast and unimaginable expanses of the endless cosmos, and embark on an epic adventure as a brave pioneer in the boundless universe! Your mission is nothing short of monumental: to colonize foreign, unexplored planets, gather valuable, life-sustaining resources, and establish a flourishing, thriving space colony of immense importance. The fate of your colonists lies in your hands, and you may even influence the destiny of the entire galaxy.

The challenges that await you are colossal, but you are ready to face them head-on. Conquer different planets, each with its own unique conditions and challenges. Every celestial body you set foot on harbors its own dangers and treasures, waiting to be discovered and utilized by you. The precious resources you uncover on your long and perilous journeys are invaluable and will aid you in continuously expanding and improving your colony. You have the freedom to build small outposts or create gigantic, imposing metropolises—it’s entirely up to you how your settlements develop over time.

But your journey doesn’t stop at mere colonization. You will explore the entire solar system, discovering new, fascinating planets, mysterious moons, and valuable asteroids that are just waiting to be explored by you. Every secret you uncover brings you a little closer to your grand objective.

For those who are particularly bold and adventurous, there’s even the possibility to create an entirely new planet of your own. Utilize the most advanced technologies at your disposal to shape a brand new world according to your own visions and desires, turning it into a center of human civilization.

This game offers you a nearly limitless and unparalleled experience in the vast, endless universe. It challenges you to colonize unknown, foreign worlds, master the complex management of vital resources, and discover and unravel the deepest, most mysterious secrets of the solar system. Create your own unique space colony and shape the future of the entire galaxy—the infinite cosmos patiently awaits you and your fearless discoveries!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
